subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Les Miles won the Coach of the Year award for the Football Bowl Subdivision after he led Louisiana State to an unbeaten regular season and the Southeastern Conference championship.
snippet: Les Miles won the Coach of the Year award for the Football Bowl Subdivision after he led Louisiana State to an unbeaten regular season and the Southeastern Conference championship.
